original: Östlund, Egon Gustaf, förste maskiningenjör, Borås, f. 20/7/89 i Gävle av Gustaf Ö. o. Karin Eklund. G. 1. 17-29 m. Karin Lindberg; 2. 47 m. Karin Svensson. Barn: Olle f. 18, Jan 19, Greta 22. — Avg:ex. fr. ma-skinyrkessk. v. Sthlms tekn. sk. 10. Ritare v. Gävle-Dala Järnv. 06-12 m. uppeh. f. verkst :prakt. o. stud., v. Motala Nya Verkst. A-B 12-16, und:ing. v. Halmstad-Nässjö Järnv. 16-1(8, ma-skining. där 19, förste maskining. 38, maskining. på SJs överg:stat fr. 46, förste m,askin;ing. v. SJ i Borås sed. 47. Led. av Halmstads brandstyr. 24-46, ordf. 31-46, led. av lönend 36-46, ordf. i civ:försv:nd 39-46, led. av arb :lösh :nd 40-46, led. av styr. f. Ensk. järnv. ing:förb. 38-46, rev. där 29-37, sekr. i Ing:fÖren. i Halmstad 19-24 samt 30-36, v. ordf. 36-38 o. ordf. 38-42, sekr. o. int. i Hall. konstfören. 32-44, ordf. 45-46, led. av styr. f. Hum. förb. i Hal|mstad 34-44’. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören. sed. 33. RVO.
translated: Östlund, Egon Gustaf, first mechanical engineer, Borås, b. 20/7/89 in Gävle to Gustaf Ö. and Karin Eklund. 1st marriage in 17-29 to Karin Lindberg; 2nd marriage in 47 to Karin Svensson. Children: Olle b. 18, Jan b. 19, Greta b. 22. Graduate: mechanical vocational school at Stockholm Technical School in 10. Draughtsman at Gävle-Dala Railway 06-12 with breaks for practical work and studies, at Motala Nya Verkst. A-B 12-16, assistant engineer at Halmstad-Nässjö Railway 16-18, mechanical engineer there in 19, first mechanical engineer in 38, mechanical engineer at SJ overgångsstället from 46, first mechanical engineer at SJ in Borås since 47. Member of Halmstad Fire Brigade 24-46, chairman 31-46, member of salary commission 36-46, chairman of civilian defense committee 39-46, member of unemployment board 40-46, member of board for Independent Railway Engineering Association 38-46, auditor there 29-37, secretary of Engineering Association in Halmstad 19-24 and 30-36, vice chairman 36-38 and chairman 38-42, secretary and treasurer of Halland Art Society 32-44, chairman 45-46, member of the board for the Humanities Association in Halmstad 34-44. Member of Swedish Technical Association since 33. Received the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).

occupation.name: Draughtsman
occupation.description: Breaks for practical work and studies
